Description.Name: Make it so...
Description.Details: Waiting for the Liaison Office to get back to you was worse than waiting for a lance of UM-R60's to finish a 50km patrol circuit. Eventually, the message arrived inviting you and [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] down to their facility. The trip down to [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] was routine and uneventful. Sumire is given coordinates to bypass the local starport and head directly to a private landing pad at the Bergan Industires facility. As you exit the Leopard you are greeted by the Bergan Industires Liaison, "Greetings Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Welcome to Bergan Industires. I am Alys Poole. The trip to the main facility is short, but please, enjoy the ride." You shake her hand and follow the others as they board the awaiting [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_BerganAPC],APC]]. Alys and [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] board last making it obvious she is more than just a contact. Arriving at the facility, everyone disembarks and Alys escorts the group past numerous guards. You can see multiple crews already working on repairing the damage done during the earlier battle. Alys stops and opens a door to a glass walled room that overlooks one of the facility's production floors. Everyone finds their seats and Alys steps to the head of the table, "Welcome again to Bergan Industries. We received your request and have humbly asked you here so we could work out the details in person rather than waiting for delayed HPG transmissions, and to be honest, I really wanted to catch up with {SCN_MW.Firstname},um... [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]. But that can wait. I was aware that {SCN_MW.Firstname} needed access to our Mech Assembly Bays, but you also wish us to provide you with the base Minsk MNK-102 chassis?" You nod, "In a nutshell, yes, that's the gist of it. We've been to six systems collecting the unique parts for this mech and all that's needed to finish is the chassis itself. Your company did ask if there was anything esle you could do to repay our part in liberating this facility. Alys puts her finger up to her ear, obviously listening to someone on the other end. She looks at you for a few moments before speaking, "Ok Commander, we don't want to look unappreciative for your assistance, but you must understand that Bergan Industries is not fully functional right now. With that in mind, we will provide you with a Minsk MNK-102 chassis, but you will have to provide the labour from your own astech teams. We will also need {SCN_MW.Firstname} onsite during the assembly to properly sync {SCN_MW.Det} biometrics for the mech's neurohelmet and security protocols. Expect around 60 days give or take to complete the rebuild." You whistle, "60 days is a long time to operate with a diminished repair team on the Argo, not to mention losing access to a valued mechwarrior. Surely there is another option on the table?" Alys scrolls through her datapad, "Keep in mind we are not billing you for any of this. If we use our existing crews, who will still have to do shifts on the facility repair detail, it could take up to 5 months to finish your project. And {SCN_MW.FirstName} would be well looked after during that time with m... us." You look directly at Alys, "What's the magic number then?" Alys looks back to you, confused, "I do not know what you mean, Commander. We cannot..." You interupt her excuse, "Don't be coy with me, you run a business, and time is money. How much do you want to expedite the assembly of the mech?" Alys stares at you for what seems like an eternity, "The chassis alone is over ¢4,000,000 not including labour and the parts you are not providing... ¢12,000,000 and 2 weeks to rush the work order. And for the record, I didn't originally offer this option because I truly wanted a way for us to provide the necessary tools without costing you any C-Bills. What is you choice?"

Description.Name: Wait up to 5 months
Description.Details: Use Bergan Industries's Astechs

Description.Name: Bergan Industries Labour
Description.Details: You sit back in your seat at the table, all eyes on you as you deliberate the options presented, "You obviously know we do not have the funds, nor the astechs to spare for this shakedown, but we have come too far and done too much to not reap the rewards of our blood, sweat and tears." You turn to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "Well, it looks like you are on an extended paid vacation here on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]. I trust you will behave yourself?" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] smiles as he looks from you to Alys and back, "You have my word, Commander. Alys and I go back a long ways, and I'll do what I can to persuade her to expedite the work on Last Rites." You give a knowing nod of your head, "Somehow, I expect things will be closer to the 5 month mark then not." You stand up as you turn back toward Alys, "Very well then, you will have [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] here for the duration of the construction of Last Rites. If you can get things done sooner rather than later, it will be much appreciated." Alys also stands, "We will do our best to expedite things where we can Commander. We were hoping you would be able to provide the labour so we could concentrate on the facility repairs, but understand your position and the needs of your company. As we are still repairing our facility, we would appreciate it if you would choose to remain in system as a deterent agains further raids until work on the mech is completed."

Description.Name: -10 MechTech for up to 60 days
Description.Details: Use ARGO's Astechs

Description.Name: ARGO Labour
Description.Details: You sit back in your seat at the table, all eyes on you as you deliberate the options presented, "Well, whilst we cannot spare the funds, we can allow some astechs to assist with the work. We have come too far and done too much to not reap the rewards of our blood, sweat and tears." You turn to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "Well, it looks like you get a paid vacation here on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]. I trust you will behave yourself?" Being able to use your astechs for most of the labour will assist our other crews so they can concentrate on the facility repairs. As we are still repairing our facility, we would appreciate it if you were to remain in system as a deterent agains further raids until work on the mech is completed."

Description.Name: pay ¢12,000,000
Description.Details: Money Talks

Description.Name: Buy Outright
Description.Details: You sit back in your seat at the table, all eyes on you as you deliberate the options presented, "As much as this feels more like a shakedown than an offer, we have come too far and done too much to not reap the rewards of our blood, sweat and tears." A stern look crosses Alys' face as she stands and moves towards the door, "You said it yourself, Commander: TIME IS MONEY. You asked what it would take to expedite this, well that is the cost that Bergan Industries was going to originally waive until you spat the dummy. We will start work when you've settled the account. You can get the account details from the front desk on your way out." As you watch her depart, you turn towards Darius, "Well, that went over like a busted gyro. Go settle the account, Darius. We have to find some contracts to help foot this bill now." You glance over at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "It looks like you are going to be here on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] for a couple weeks. Keep us up to date on the mechs' status." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] nods, "I will keep you posted, Commander. Alys is a bit fiery and we go back a long ways. I'll do what I can to persuade her to expedite the work on Last Rites." As everyone heads back to tthe transport, Darius joins the group, "Commander, our account is paid in full. As they are still repairing their facility, Bergan Industries is hoping we would remain in system as a deterent against further raids. They will alert us when the work is completed on Last Rites."
